reviews.text: You dont' get many chances to stay in a 900 year old castle, so when I spotted Traquair, I knew we had to go there for a weekend break. we took our kids, aged 4 and 8, and booked a room in the old house for us
reviews.title: Unique experience

likes.disliked: — scottish insect invasion in the bathroom when we left lights on and window open!
